name: Blast Sphere (Anime)
text:
When this card is Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; Equip this card to that target, and if you cannot, destroy this card. During the next turn's Standby Phase: Destroy this card and apply 1 of the following effects:
? If the equipped monster's ATK was equal to or less than this card's ATK it had on the field, destroy the equipped monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the difference.
? If the equipped monster's ATK was higher than this card's ATK it had on the field, take damage equal to the difference.
